1.title: Secret Mail Order
1.plot: An upcoming doctor buys people's secrets to his advantage, but soon his own secrets will catch up with him.

2.title: My Own Reflection
2.plot: Fashionista Mei Ji thinks there's someone stalking her and copying what she wears everyday. Is it just her imagination?.

3.title: Lucid Dream
3.plot: A literature professor undergoes lucid dream therapy to overcome his grief over his wife's death.

4.title: Letters That Pass Through Time and Space
4.plot: A one-hit wonder suddenly receives fan mail from five years ago.

5.title: Search Dependence Disorder
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Life Textbook
6.plot: Tian Yi Ping has been living his life according to the life goals he set in Fourth grade.

7.title: The Little Girl Who Breaks Things Apart
7.plot: A new transfer student in class has a weird hobby of breaking things apart.

8.title: Imprisoned
8.plot: Two gangsters follow the big boss' order to kidnap and imprison a guy. But no one seems to have a clear picture of who the big boss is.

9.title: Sharing Life
9.plot: A down and out young man finds an incredibly cheap accommodation at Share A Home, where everyone who lives there share everything with everyone.

10.title: Mysterious Stone Statue
10.plot: There is a mysterious stone statue that makes people's wishes come true, but for the amount of happiness you receive you'll have to accept the same amount of misfortune.

11.title: Five Minutes
11.plot: A grief-stricken grandpa is willing to pay a high price to reunite with his dead grandson.

12.title: Ideal Girlfriend
12.plot: With the help of the magical Ideal Girlfriend Creator machine, Xu Ming Hao finds the woman of his dreams.

13.title: Life Bank
13.plot: Losing his will to live, Zhou Yi registers at Life Bank where you can exchange your soul with a dying soul that wishes to live.

14.title: The Woman Who Never
14.plot: After receiving a cornea transplant, Feng Tao keeps seeing a woman in red.

15.title: Planetary Debris
15.plot: A young photographer, Honda Kyoichi, travels the world with his camera to fulfill a promise he made 5 years ago.

imdb.plot outline: Are the people going about their lives around you really strangers? Fifteen people living in Beijing encounter tragedy, sadness, love, hate and horror. But will the strangers discover that their lives are connected in unexpected ways? "Mysterious Summer" is a 2014 horror series first-of-its-kind joint venture by Japan's Fuji TV and China's iQIYI video platform, which is a subsidiary of the Chinese search giant Baidu.
